conversation.text: I would highly recommend watching "Elysium" (2013). This movie is an intense and thought-provoking exploration of what it means to be alive in a world that is increasingly divided by political, economic, and social differences. The movie follows the story of a wealthy man who has built his fortune through illegal activities such as drug trafficking and money laundering. When this wealthy man dies unexpectedly, he leaves behind a large fortune and several highly suspicious clues that suggest that this wealthy man was not only involved in illegal activities, but was also responsible for the mysterious disappearance of one of his closest friends.

One of them unknowingly gets infected with an unknown virus that begins to change him. They encounter an eccentric police officer who apparently has something to hide.
